Hospital.english: 1. The doctor is examining the patient.
Hospital.italian: Il medico sta visitando il paziente.
Hospital.spanish: El doctor está examinando al paciente.
Hospital.german: Der Arzt untersucht den Patienten.

Hospital.english: 2. The nurse is taking the patient's blood pressure.
Hospital.italian: L'infermiera sta misurando la pressione sanguigna del paziente.
Hospital.spanish: La enfermera está tomando la presión arterial del paciente.
Hospital.german: Die Krankenschwester misst den Blutdruck des Patienten.

Hospital.english: 3. The hospital has a specialized cardiac unit.
Hospital.italian: L'ospedale ha un'unità cardiologica specializzata.
Hospital.spanish: El hospital cuenta con una unidad cardíaca especializada.
Hospital.german: Das Krankenhaus verfügt über eine spezialisierte Herzstation.

Hospital.english: 4. The surgeon is preparing for the operation.
Hospital.italian: Il chirurgo si sta preparando per l'operazione.
Hospital.spanish: El cirujano se está preparando para la operación.
Hospital.german: Der Chirurg bereitet sich auf die Operation vor.

Hospital.english: 5. The patient is recovering well after the surgery.
Hospital.italian: Il paziente sta recuperando bene dopo l'intervento chirurgico.
Hospital.spanish: El paciente se está recuperando bien después de la cirugía.
Hospital.german: Der Patient erholt sich gut nach der Operation.

Hospital.english: 6. The maternity ward is on the third floor.
Hospital.italian: Il reparto di maternità si trova al terzo piano.
Hospital.spanish: La sala de maternidad está en el tercer piso.
Hospital.german: Die Entbindungsstation befindet sich im dritten Stock.

Hospital.english: 7. The hospital cafeteria serves a variety of meals.
Hospital.italian: La mensa dell'ospedale offre una varietà di pasti.
Hospital.spanish: La cafetería del hospital sirve una variedad de comidas.
Hospital.german: Die Krankenhauscafeteria bietet eine Vielzahl von Mahlzeiten an.

Hospital.english: 8. The pediatrician is examining the child.
Hospital.italian: Il pediatra sta visitando il bambino.
Hospital.spanish: El pediatra está examinando al niño.
Hospital.german: Der Kinderarzt untersucht das Kind.

Hospital.english: 9. The emergency room is always busy.
Hospital.italian: Il pronto soccorso è sempre affollato.
Hospital.spanish: La sala de emergencias siempre está ocupada.
Hospital.german: Die Notaufnahme ist immer voll.

Hospital.english: 10. The hospital provides free parking for visitors.
Hospital.italian: L'ospedale offre parcheggio gratuito per i visitatori.
Hospital.spanish: El hospital proporciona estacionamiento gratuito para los visitantes.
Hospital.german: Das Krankenhaus bietet kostenloses Parken für Besucher.

Hospital.english: 11. The physical therapist is helping the patient with exercises.
Hospital.italian: Il fisioterapista sta aiutando il paziente con gli esercizi.
Hospital.spanish: El fisioterapeuta está ayudando al paciente con ejercicios.
Hospital.german: Der Physiotherapeut hilft dem Patienten bei Übungen.

Hospital.english: 12. The hospital staff is wearing protective masks.
Hospital.italian: Il personale dell'ospedale indossa maschere di protezione.
Hospital.spanish: El personal del hospital lleva mascarillas de protección.
Hospital.german: Das Krankenhauspersonal trägt Schutzmasken.

Hospital.english: 13. The ambulance arrived quickly at the scene.
Hospital.italian: L'ambulanza è arrivata rapidamente sul posto.
Hospital.spanish: La ambulancia llegó rápidamente al lugar.
Hospital.german: Der Krankenwagen kam schnell an der Unfallstelle an.

Hospital.english: 14. The hospital has a state-of-the-art laboratory.
Hospital.italian: L'ospedale dispone di un laboratorio all'avanguardia.
Hospital.spanish: El hospital cuenta con un laboratorio de última generación.
Hospital.german: Das Krankenhaus verfügt über ein hochmodernes Labor.

Hospital.english: 15. The patient is complaining of severe pain.
Hospital.italian: Il paziente si lamenta di un forte dolore.
Hospital.spanish: El paciente se queja de un dolor intenso.
Hospital.german: Der Patient klagt über starke Schmerzen.

Hospital.english: 16. The hospital has strict visiting hours.
Hospital.italian: L'ospedale ha orari di visita rigorosi.
Hospital.spanish: El hospital tiene horarios de visita estrictos.
Hospital.german: Das Krankenhaus hat strenge Besuchszeiten.

Hospital.english: 17. The hospital is conducting clinical trials for a new drug.
Hospital.italian: L'ospedale sta conducendo studi clinici su un nuovo farmaco.
Hospital.spanish: El hospital está llevando a cabo ensayos clínicos para un nuevo medicamento.
Hospital.german: Das Krankenhaus führt klinische Studien für ein neues Medikament durch.

Hospital.english: 18. The patient is scheduled for an MRI scan.
Hospital.italian: Il paziente è programmato per una scansione MRI.
Hospital.spanish: El paciente tiene programada una resonancia magnética.
Hospital.german: Der Patient hat einen Termin für eine MRT-Untersuchung.

Hospital.english: 19. The hospital provides counseling services for mental health.
Hospital.italian: L'ospedale offre servizi di consulenza per la salute mentale.
Hospital.spanish: El hospital ofrece servicios de asesoramiento para la salud mental.
Hospital.german: Das Krankenhaus bietet Beratungsdienste für psychische Gesundheit an.

Hospital.english: 20. The hospital has a helipad for medical helicopter landings.
Hospital.italian: L'ospedale ha una piazzola per l'atterraggio di elicotteri medici.
Hospital.spanish: El hospital cuenta con una plataforma de aterrizaje para helicópteros médicos.
Hospital.german: Das Krankenhaus verfügt über einen Hubschrauberlandeplatz für medizinische Landungen.
